name: Saurav Adhikari
title: UI Visuals Leader
description: As the leader and Design head of UI Visuals for the year 2022/23, I have been proud to be part of a community that is truly passionate about design and creativity. Through UI Visuals, I have had the opportunity to work with some incredibly talented individuals and collaborate on some truly amazing projects. I am grateful for the chance to contribute to this community and help shape its future, and I look forward to seeing all the incredible things UI Visuals will accomplish in the years to come.
